backup_location.description: Target location of the backup archive.

etcd.description: Custom parameters for the ETCD snapshot creation task.

source_node.description: The name of the node to create a snapshot from. The node must be a control-plane and have an ETCD data located on it.

nodes.description: Add additional files for backup, or disable the default ones. Keys are the full file or directory paths. Values are the enable or exclude indicators.

kubernetes.description: Specify resources for export if you need only a restricted set of resources.

namespaces.description: Namespaces from which to export. Specify 'all' to export everything.

resources.description: Full names of the resources to be exported. Specify 'all' to export everything.

nonnamespaced_resources.description: Full names of the non-namespaced resources to be exported. Specify 'all' to export everything.
